#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int cc,a,b,ar,br,cry;
    while(1)
    {
        cc=0;
        scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
        if((a==0)&&(b==0))
        {
            break;
        }
        else{
            cry=0;
            while((a!=0)||(b!=0)){
 
                ar=a%10;
                br=b%10;
 
                a=a/10;
                b=b/10;
                cry=(ar+br+cry)/10;
 
                if(cry!=0)
                {
                    cc++;
 
                }
            }
            if(cc==0)
                printf("No carry operation.\n");
            else if(cc==1)
                printf("1 carry operation.\n");
            else
                printf("%d carry operations.\n",cc);
 
        }
    }
}
